Question
========

In a normal distribution, what is the area under the tail of the distribution to the right of the point μ + 0.5σ?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.159
* 0.309
* 0.692

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.159: Incorrect
* 0.309: Correct
* 0.692: Incorrect
